Token.Abstract: Called when a segue is about to be performed. (required)

Parameter.Name: segue
Parameter.Abstract: The segue object containing information about the view controllers involved in the segue.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The object that initiated the segue. You might use this parameter to perform different actions based on which control (or other object) initiated the segue.
